MAN.TITLE: ell1mag

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : sample vector of values in the complex plane
: elliptic filter values at sample points

DESCRIPTION.P: Function used for squared magnitude of an elliptic filter. Usually m1=eps*eps/(a*a-1). Returns v=real(ones(z)./(ones(z)+eps*eps*s.*s)) for s=%sn(z,m1).
